column4: Hmmm.. well Camorama won't work. I suppose I'll try another program from the repo.
for webcams start by trying them with cheese
have you tested that it was the kernel update that did it?  ie have you booted the old kernel and does it work?  Hold down shift as computer is starting to get grub menu (if grub2).
I haven't. I'll do that now, thanks.
